profiles.name: Enrique Montes
profiles.summary:
Seeking lightning-fast websites that enhance performance, attract users, and boost online revenue?

 I build Next.js and Gatsby solutions that address your most significant web challenges.
 With over 30 years in IT, plus 5 years of React mastery.
 I deliver blazing-fast, SEO-focused experiences that elevate your online brand and visibility.
 Harness SSR, SSG, and dynamic routing for speed, scalability, and user satisfaction.
 Let me reduce load times, amplify conversions, and reinforce your online presence.

 Ready to elevate your business with a future-proof solution built for success?

I'm Enrique Montes, a Full-Stack Developer bringing over 30 years of IT expertise and 5+ years of modern React experience. By leveraging Server-Side Rendering (SSR), Static Site Generation (SSG), and Headless CMS (Strapi, Contentful, Sanity), I craft high-performance, SEO-friendly websites that excel in speed and user engagement.

 Here's how I can help your business thrive:

- High-Performance Development: Crafting modern, scalable sites with Next.js or Gatsby.
- Headless CMS Integration: Connecting Strapi, Contentful, or Sanity for easy content management.
- UI/UX Design: Building engaging interfaces with Tailwind CSS, Styled-Components, and responsive layouts.
- API-Driven Architectures: Utilizing REST or GraphQL for robust, data-centric applications.

 Let's collaborate and create a lightning-fast, scalable web solution tailored to your goals. Message me on Upwork now, and we'll turn your vision into a high-performance reality. 

 Core Skills:

 Front-End Development:
- JavaScript (ES7+, Babel)
- React.js
- Next.js (App Router, Static/Server-Side Rendering)
- Gatsby.js (Static Site Generation)
- HTML5, CSS3, SCSS
- Tailwind CSS, Styled-components
- UI Frameworks: Material UI, Bootstrap, Reactstrap

 Backend & API Development:
- RESTful APIs & GraphQL
- Node.js, Express.js
- Headless CMS integration: Strapi, Contentful, WordPress
- Apigility, Laminas from Zend

 CMS & Headless Solutions:
- WordPress (Gatsby or Next.js Sourcing WordPress)
- Strapi (Preferred for Headless CMS)
- Sanity, Contentful, Prismic

 Hosting & Deployment:
- Vercel, Netlify, AWS, Digital Ocean
- Serverless Deployments
- CI/CD Pipelines

 Search & Optimization:
- Typesense, Algolia
- SEO Optimization for Static Sites
- Lighthouse Performance Tuning

 Development Tools & Workflows:
- Git/GitHub, CI/CD
- Visual Studio Code, Docker

 Experience:
With extensive experience developing full-stack applications for diverse clients, I have a proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions built on Next.js and Gatsby.js. From building blazing-fast static sites to crafting dynamic, API-driven web apps, I ensure that every project is optimized for performance and scalability.

 Why Work with Me?

 Focused Expertise: Specialized in Next.js and Gatsby, ensuring I provide tailored solutions with the most advanced features.
 Reliable & Transparent: I prioritize clear communication and deliver regular updates, ensuring transparency throughout the development process.
 Performance-Driven: I implement best practices to achieve high-performance, SEO-friendly web applications that exceed client expectations.

portfolio.title: Peters – App Optimization & Enhancement
portfolio.description: I resolved critical issues with Gravity Forms data integration from WordPress, stabilizing the app's functionality. Subsequently, I made significant improvements to the overall application's performance using Gatsby.js and Netlify hosting. This project demonstrated my ability to enhance data handling and boost app efficiency.

portfolio.title: Bridge Artists – Website Maintenance & Data Modeling
portfolio.description: I was hired to fix existing errors on a Gatsby site using Contentful, hosted on Netlify. After resolving these issues, I took over site development, performing general app modifications, site maintenance, and data modeling, which enhanced API integration and overall site performance.

portfolio.title: Sustainable Luxury Fountain Pen - Next.js Tailwind CSS
portfolio.description: This was a truly beautiful project where I collaborated on the integration of Nextjs and the creation of some interactive animations using Tailwind CSS. It involved incorporating the Next.js React framework to build a modern, performant website with server-side rendering capabilities. Additionally, I utilized the utility-first Tailwind CSS library to craft sleek and responsive UI components. A key aspect was implementing eye-catching interactive animations through Tailwind's animation utilities, resulting in an engaging and visually appealing user experience.

portfolio.title: Texas Ranches for Sale – Gatsby Website Development & Maintenance
portfolio.description: I developed and maintained a dynamic website for Texas Ranches for Sale using Gatsby, integrated with Sanity CRM for effective content management, and Algolia for powerful search functionality. This project required expertise in creating seamless user experiences and ensuring fast, efficient searches. The site enhancements boosted user engagement and streamlined content updates.

portfolio.title: MoneyGeek – Website Update & Full-Stack Development
portfolio.description: I enhanced the MoneyGeek platform by updating its website using Gatsby for a swift front end and Strapi for flexible content management. This project improved UI/UX design and optimized site performance. Subsequently, I expanded into full-stack development, adding new features and seamless third-party integrations. The result was a scalable, engaging site that increased user engagement and conversion rates.

portfolio.title: Osmocote - Gatsby Update from V2 to V5
portfolio.description: I addressed technical debt in an app integrating WordPress data with an outdated Gatsby version by upgrading it to the latest version. This update enhanced performance and compatibility. Subsequently, I conducted various developments across the app, improving functionality and user experience. Key skills utilized: Gatsby.js, GraphQL, React, WordPress as CMS, and Netlify hosting solutions, ensuring the app's robust operation and maintainability.
